game.name: Setuna:Legend of Hamburger 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: All motions, all frames cancelable. The second installment of the ultra-free 3D action-adventure [SETUNA]. Challenge the limits of your skills with a fully professional-grade input system!
